text.config.mysticalConfig.option.failed: Failed to get a random block
Mystical tried to choose a random block type, but failed.
text.mystical.config.criticalError: Mystical will try to prevent crashes, but if this error comes up, there is something seriously wrong.
If you experience this error, please report it.
Only change this if you know what you are doing.
text.mystical.config.importantError: If this error comes up, something has gone wrong, and Mystical can't fix it.
Though this is rare, it still happens, and there's not much we can do.
If you've lost data, ask for help recovering it.
text.mystical.config.commonError: This is a common error, for one reason or another. Mystical will handle it for you.
It's likely that nothing has gone wrong, but the info may be helpful if there's a bigger problem to solve.
text.mystical.eventHandler.setNightTimer: Couldn't set timer for night. Reason: %s
text.mystical.havenManager.loadFailed: Failed to load the haven manager. Maybe it doesn't exist yet?
text.mystical.havenManager.saveFailed: Failed to save the haven manager.
text.mystical.spellGenerator.emptyConseq: SpellGenerator found an empty consequence supplier list. Using default consequence (levitate, 0 pts).
text.mystical.spellGenerator.emptyCureLi: SpellGenerator found an empty cure list. Using default cure (mine 10 cactus).
text.mystical.spellGenerator.failedRando: SpellGenerator failed to choose a random block. How? No clue. Using a command block instead.
text.mystical.spellHandler.loadFailed: Failed to load SpellHandler because the save file was not found. This is normal when the mod is run for the first time.
text.mystical.statSerializer.failedSeria: Mystical couldn't serialize a Stat<?> properly. Using a null value instead.
